Breadth-First.Explanation: Gathering general visual and contextual clues (tiles, UNESCO sign, district) and tentatively narrowing to Landungsbrücken without deep verification.
Comparing two tunnel possibilities (historic vs modern) and using shallow feature recall (mosaic façade, bicycles) to hone in on the historic tunnel.

Depth-First.Explanation: Detailed, convergent analysis of construction dates, Goldmark reference, Art-Nouveau tiling and transport signage to confirm the precise north entrance at Landungsbrücken.
Final confirmation statement pinpointing the exact spot based on accumulated evidence.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from shallow hypothesis comparison to in-depth verification of specific architectural and historical clues.
